articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Virus Spreads to Japanese Retailers Addicted to Chinese Shoppers
articles.description: China is not only home to new, growing markets for stores, but also provides a steady stream of tourists visiting Japan and boosting domestic sales.
articles.content:
(Bloomberg) -- For already-suffering Japanese retailers, the rapidly spreading novel coronavirus could further dent business by keeping away one of their few growing groups of patrons: Chinese shoppers.
Chinas efforts to control the coronavirus have led to a… [+4123 chars]

articles.title: Macau Tourist Arrivals From China Plunge 80% in Blow for Casinos
articles.description: China’s deadly virus outbreak is threatening the outlook for casino operators in the world’s largest gambling hub.
articles.content:
China’s deadly virus outbreak is threatening the outlook for casino operators in the world’s largest gambling hub.
The number of mainland Chinese visitors to Macau fell 80% on Sunday, the third day of the holiday, compared with the equivalent day during last… [+1972 chars]
